policyname: Allow admin full access on categories
Allow vendors to create their own categories
check_expression:
((( SELECT profiles.role
   FROM profiles
  WHERE (profiles.id = auth.uid())) = 'vendor'::user_role) AND (vendor_id = auth.uid()))

policyname: Allow vendors to delete their own categories
using_expression:
((( SELECT profiles.role
   FROM profiles
  WHERE (profiles.id = auth.uid())) = 'vendor'::user_role) AND (vendor_id = auth.uid()))

policyname: Allow vendors to update their own categories
using_expression:
((( SELECT profiles.role
   FROM profiles
  WHERE (profiles.id = auth.uid())) = 'vendor'::user_role) AND (vendor_id = auth.uid()))

policyname: Allow vendors to view their own categories
using_expression:
((( SELECT profiles.role
   FROM profiles
  WHERE (profiles.id = auth.uid())) = 'vendor'::user_role) AND (vendor_id = auth.uid()))

policyname: Allow admin full access on counters
Allow vendors to create their own counters
Allow vendors to delete their own counters
using_expression:
((( SELECT profiles.role
   FROM profiles
  WHERE (profiles.id = auth.uid())) = 'vendor'::user_role) AND (vendor_id = auth.uid()))

policyname: Allow vendors to update their own counters
using_expression:
((( SELECT profiles.role

  WHERE (profiles.id = auth.uid())) = 'vendor'::user_role) AND (vendor_id = auth.uid()))

using_expression:

policyname: Allow admin full access on menu_items
Allow authenticated users to view available menu items
Allow vendors to create items for their counters
check_expression:
(is_vendor() AND (counter_id IN ( SELECT counters.id
   FROM counters
  WHERE (counters.vendor_id = auth.uid()))))

policyname: Allow vendors to delete items from their counters
using_expression:
(is_vendor() AND (counter_id IN ( SELECT counters.id
   FROM counters
  WHERE (counters.vendor_id = auth.uid()))))

policyname: Allow vendors to update items on their counters
using_expression:
(is_vendor() AND (counter_id IN ( SELECT counters.id
   FROM counters
  WHERE (counters.vendor_id = auth.uid()))))
check_expression:
(counter_id IN ( SELECT counters.id
   FROM counters
  WHERE (counters.vendor_id = auth.uid())))

policyname: Allow vendors to view all their menu items
using_expression:
(is_vendor() AND (counter_id IN ( SELECT counters.id
   FROM counters
  WHERE (counters.vendor_id = auth.uid()))))

policyname: Allow admin full access on order_items
Allow students to create their own order items
check_expression:
(is_student() AND (order_id IN ( SELECT orders.id
   FROM orders
  WHERE (orders.user_id = auth.uid()))))

policyname: Allow students to view their own order items
using_expression:
(is_student() AND (order_id IN ( SELECT orders.id
   FROM orders
  WHERE (orders.user_id = auth.uid()))))

policyname: Allow vendors to update status of their order items
using_expression:
((( SELECT profiles.role
   FROM profiles
  WHERE (profiles.id = auth.uid())) = 'vendor'::user_role) AND (counter_id IN ( SELECT counters.id
   FROM counters
  WHERE (counters.vendor_id = auth.uid()))))
check_expression:
(counter_id IN ( SELECT counters.id
   FROM counters
  WHERE (counters.vendor_id = auth.uid())))

policyname: Allow vendors to view their order items
using_expression:
((( SELECT profiles.role
   FROM profiles
  WHERE (profiles.id = auth.uid())) = 'vendor'::user_role) AND (counter_id IN ( SELECT counters.id
   FROM counters
  WHERE (counters.vendor_id = auth.uid()))))

policyname: Allow admin full access on orders
Allow students to create their own orders
Allow students to view their own orders
Allow vendors to create orders for themselves (POS)
Allow vendors to view orders with their items
Allow admin update access on profiles
Users can update own profile.
Users can view their own profile.
Allow admin full access on tax_rates
Allow vendors to manage their own tax rates
Allow users to view their own transactions
Allow admin full access on vendor_applications
Allow users to submit their own application
Allow users to view their own application
Allow admin full access on vendor_settings
Allow vendors to update their own settings
Allow vendors to view their own settings
